experience.title: 360° Illustration Experience
experience.featured: Nuomi’s works are famous for subtle illustrations of cities in Taiwan. The website features his hand-drawn illustrations in 360°. I worked closely with Nuomi and Charlene, who was an illustrator broker.

gallery.detail: Detail of a Nuomi’s Architecture Box

retrospect.title: Retrospect
retrospect.description: The specification of websites has been elevated a lot since early 2017. In retrospect, these should be done to meet the minimum requirement:

https.title: HTTPS
https.description: Google Chrome has been notifying visitors that a website is not safe without HTTPS since Oct. 2018.

structured.title: Structured Data
structured.description: What makes setting up a website valuable are the positions in search results & visits. These are the basics.

accessibility.title: Accessibility
accessibility.description: There have been tools to summarize accessibility automatically. Besides, the developer tool on accessibility in Google Chrome has been much more comprehensive than that 2 years ago.
